entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
